page.title: 01One Day in l985.
page.content: I get at at nine'0' clock on Saturday morning, I get dressed and have my breakfast of tea with a slice of toast.Today was a special day, it was the day I was going to watch my favourite football team which is Tottenham Hotspur play Wolverhampton Wanderers at football. I went down stairs to find my sister watching the television, she was watching 'Saturday Superstore', a programme for children which includes cartoons,stories, music and other subjects of interest to children in l985, a cartoon was on the screen so I stopped and watched. After about five minutes the cartoon was finished so I went to get my Tottenham Hotspur hat and scarf, after that my friends Joe Harris, Simon Weston,Andrew Copeland and Philip Trow came knocking at the
